text: @SpeakerPelosi I WANT TO SEE THE ACTUAL CAUSES OF DEATH OF THESE PEOPLE. DOCTORS ARE SAYING THAT THEY WERE TOLD TO USE COVID-19 AS CAUSE OF DEATH EVEN THOUGH THE PERSON DIDN’T DIE OF COVID-19.
